shows.title: The Light Keeper
shows.desc:
Love, grief, hope, faith and longing collide in the stunning landscape of Beachy Head, on the edge of a 400ft cliff. Premiere of a brand new performance by Cole Moreton, featuring original songs and stories from his debut novel.

Writer, broadcaster and passionate Greenbelter Cole Moreton says his debut novel was born out of the spirit of the festival.
